    net.jordaria.event  

    • Uses of Event in net.jordaria.event

      Subclasses of Event in net.jordaria.event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DebugMessage
      Fired when a message is sent to the console.
      class  EntityCreated
      Fired when an entity is created.
      class  EntityMove
      Fired when an entity has moved.
      class  EntityMoveRequest
      Fired when an interface requests that an entity move.
      class  Error
      Fired when an error occurs.
      class  EventSystemStarted
      Fired when the Event system has been started and is now running.
      class  GamePaused
      Fired when the game has been paused.
      class  GameResumed
      Fired when the game has been resumed.
      class  GraphicsSystemStarted
      Fired when the graphics system has been initialized and is now running.
      class  HumanViewAttached
      Fired when a human view has been attached, and is now working.
      class  MapChanged
      Fired when the map has changed.
      class  PhysicsSystemStarted
      Fired when the physics system has been initialized and is now working.
      class  ShuttingDown
      Fired when the program is shutting down.
      class  SoundSystemStarted
      Fired when the sound system has been initialized and is now working.
      class  Tick
      Fired to tick subsystems.
